system.description: As raise dead, but restores life and full strength to any deceased creature. Condition of remains is not a factor; so long as some small portion of the body exists, it can be resurrected (dead no longer than 10 years per caster level). Subject is restored to full hp, vigor, health, with no loss of prepared spells, but loses one level (or 2 Con if 1st level). Level/Con loss cannot be repaired. Can resurrect those killed by death effects or turned undead then destroyed. Cannot resurrect death from old age. Constructs, elementals, outsiders, and undead can't be resurrected.

components.materialDescription: A sprinkle of holy water and diamonds worth at least 10,000 gp.
